TextBlock.Text: CASSAVA: Friends on the <color=orange>Sun Station:</color> I am overjoyed to have the chance to visit and admire your work as well!
CASSAVA: However, as I appear to have visited in your absence, I dared not touch any controls aboard the <color=orange>Sun Station</color> to discover how it operated.
CASSAVA: Still, I cannot help but wonder... How does the <color=orange>Sun Station</color> work?
CASSAVA: I am not aware of any mechanisms that could cause such significant impact to a star.. I am rather curious what methods the <color=orange>Sun Station</color> will use to cause such an effect!

PYE: I would be happy to explain it to you aboard the <color=orange>Sun Station,</color> Cassava. I am glad to be able to repay your hospitality after seeing your hard work on <color=lightblue>Giant's Deep!</color>
PYE: Of note: I must humbly implore anyone else who wishes to visit the <color=orange>Sun Station</color> to kindly inform us ahead of time!

PYE: With such devastating power at its control, it is truly of utmost importance that anyone who visits the <color=orange>Sun Station</color> takes the utmost care near the <color=orange>control bay.</color>
